XSAX

Source: R/trans_xsax.R
trans_xsax.Rd

XSAX

Usage

trans_xsax(alpha)

Arguments

alpha

alphabet

Value

obj

Examples

library(daltoolbox)
vector <- 1:52
model <- trans_xsax(alpha = 52)
model <- fit(model, vector)
xvector <- transform(model, vector)
print(xvector)
#>  [1] "00" "01" "02" "03" "04" "05" "06" "07" "08" "09" "0A" "0B" "0C" "0D" "0E"
#> [16] "0F" "0G" "0H" "0I" "0J" "0K" "0L" "0M" "0N" "0O" "0P" "0Q" "0R" "0S" "0T"
#> [31] "0U" "0V" "0W" "0X" "0Y" "0Z" "10" "11" "12" "13" "14" "15" "16" "17" "18"
#> [46] "19" "1A" "1B" "1C" "1D" "1E" "1F"
